channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cboe to launch new cash-settled bitcoin options
item.description: Traders will soon have another option for trading option contracts linked to the price of bitcoin.

item.title: 'I Don't Know Where to Turn or What to Do.' His $763,094 Retirement Fund Is in Limbo.
item.description: Richard Whitacre transferred his entire 401(k) into an account offering a ‘guaranteed’ 15.25% return. Will he ever see his money again?

item.title: Election leaves U.S. consumer sentiment frozen. Republicans are excited, Democrats dispirited.
item.description: A burst of confidence among Republicans after Donald Trump’s victory in the presidential election was offset by dashed hopes among Democrats, leaving ...

item.title: Biden needs to push through promised student-loan relief before Trump returns to White House, powerful Democrat warns
item.description: The Biden administration needs to move quickly to cancel the student loans of borrowers who were already promised relief before President-elect Donald...

item.title: Nvidia and the Magnificent Seven probably make up too much of your high-priced index fund, especially when the S&P 500 is this expensive
item.description: Also: Viking Therapeutics and a push to transform weight-loss treatment, bitcoin hits $100,000, and tips for filling out the federal student-aid form.

item.title: This Roth strategy lets elite savers stash $70,000 in their 401(k) in 2025
item.description: As people plan out their budgets for 2025, there’s a chance for high earners to supercharge their retirement savings using the “mega-backdoor Roth” st...

item.title: U.S. Stocks Trade Higher
item.description: U.S. stocks rose, building on gains made earlier this week. Meanwhile, across the Atlantic, Europe’s economy isn’t in good shape — and that boosted th...

item.title: Euro Risks Dropping to Parity Against Dollar as Economy Falters
item.description: The euro fell to a two-year low against the dollar and risks reaching parity, as concerns mount about the prospects for the eurozone economy.

item.title: Swiss Private Bank EFG Aims to Win More Wealthy Clients
item.description: The bank, which competes with UBS Group, is on the hunt for acquisitions, EFG Chief Executive Giorgio Pradelli said.

item.title: Europe's Gas Prices Surge to Year-Highs Amid Supply Risks, Rising Demand
item.description: An intensification of the war between Russia and Ukraine is fueling concerns over potential curtailments in Europe’s gas market.
